title: OpenEnv
description: An open spec and hub for reinforcement learning environments.

title: Monarch
description: A distributed execution engine for PyTorch workloads.

title: TorchForge
description: A PyTorch-native agentic reinforcement learning library.

title: TorchComms
description: Communication primitives for distributed PyTorch training.

title: TorchRec
description: Domain library for recommendation systems, including distributed embedding tables and data pipelining.

title: TorchCodec
description: Fast, hardware-accelerated video and audio decoding with native PyTorch tensor output.
